short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension Shows ETN coin in USD price.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension showing the latest USD price of the crypto Electroneum (ETN) on the HitBTC exchange. Click on the extension icon to refresh the price. Price is updated automatically every 5 minutes.
